explainability.path_to_improvement: Document how explanations are provided to users affected by AI decisions.

external_accountability.path_to_improvement: Obtain external validation of AI practices or require vendor certifications.

fairness.path_to_improvement: Document bias testing procedures or vendor AI fairness requirements.

governance.findings: Technical papers indicate involvement in AI/ML, identifying lead roles and describing execution verbs for use case initiation and development. Governance is also implied by blog posts describing data use for user profiling and ad targeting, suggesting considerations for automated systems. Furthermore, the AI strategy mentions a commitment to oversight and accountability, with audit reports suggesting the existence of relevant policies.
governance.path_to_improvement: Name an AI governance body with defined mandate covering all AI use.

relevant_sources.summary: This technical paper provides evidence for the **governance** and **transparency** pillars of responsible AI. It supports transparency by detailing the machine learning inference generation methods, model deployment, data processing steps, and the specific ML algorithms and frameworks used, such as Amazon SageMaker and DeepAR. The document also indicates operational involvement and governance through the identification of lead roles for AI/ML and descriptions of execution verbs related to the use case's initiation and development.
relevant_sources.title: Energy Price Forecasting with Machine Learning - AWS Case Study

relevant_sources.summary: This blog post provides evidence for the **governance** and **transparency** pillars of responsible AI. Transparency is demonstrated through the explicit mention of AI capabilities used for content creation, image generation, and video presenter production. Governance is implied by the description of data use for user profiling and ad targeting, suggesting considerations for automated systems, although specific mechanisms are not detailed.
relevant_sources.title: AI-Powered E-Learning Content Creation - isEazy Author Integration

relevant_sources.summary: This third-party audit report, "Responsible AI Assessment - RAI Scores," provides evidence for the **governance** and **oversight** pillars of responsible AI. The report indicates that World Kinect's AI strategy mentions a commitment to oversight and accountability, suggesting the existence of relevant policies.
relevant_sources.title: Responsible AI Assessment - RAI Scores

oversight.findings: The company's AI strategy mentions a commitment to both oversight and accountability. Third-party audit reports suggest the existence of relevant policies supporting these commitments.
oversight.path_to_improvement: Publish override mechanisms, escalation processes, or appeal workflows.

relevant_sources.summary: This third-party audit report, "Responsible AI Assessment - RAI Scores," provides evidence for the **governance** and **oversight** pillars of responsible AI. The report indicates that World Kinect's AI strategy mentions a commitment to oversight and accountability, suggesting the existence of relevant policies.
relevant_sources.title: Responsible AI Assessment - RAI Scores

privacy.findings: Sources describe documented privacy practices in 1 source(s). Additional documentation references related practices.
privacy.path_to_improvement: Publish AI-specific privacy impact assessments or data handling procedures.

transparency.findings: Technical papers detail machine learning inference generation methods, model deployment, data processing steps, and specific ML algorithms and frameworks used. Additionally, blog posts explicitly mention AI capabilities utilized for content creation, image generation, and video presenter production.
transparency.path_to_improvement: Publish detailed documentation (model cards, system specs) for AI systems deployed.

relevant_sources.summary: This technical paper provides evidence for the **governance** and **transparency** pillars of responsible AI. It supports transparency by detailing the machine learning inference generation methods, model deployment, data processing steps, and the specific ML algorithms and frameworks used, such as Amazon SageMaker and DeepAR. The document also indicates operational involvement and governance through the identification of lead roles for AI/ML and descriptions of execution verbs related to the use case's initiation and development.

summary.overall_findings: World Kinect's technical papers detail machine learning inference generation methods and identify lead roles for AI/ML. These practices are documented across 4 publicly available sources, addressing 4 of 7 evaluated responsible AI pillars. Additionally, its AI strategy mentions a commitment to oversight and accountability, and documented privacy practices are described in published materials. No qualifying public evidence was found for fairness, explainability, and 1 additional pillar.
